speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the report by Csaba Sándor Tabajdi, on behalf of the Committee on Agriculture and Rural Development, on sustainable agriculture and biogas: a need for review of EU legislation ( 2007/2107(INI) ) ( A6-0034/2008 ).

agenda_item: Sustainable agriculture and biogas: review of EU legislation (debate)
